title: [feature request] method to dump a Variable's underlying computation graph
body_html:
Is there any method to dump a Variable's underlying computation graph? This will be useful for debugging use.

For example, some people may be confused about whether Variable.clone() clones the computation graph or not. In this case, a dump of the graph would be useful.

For example, some people may be confused about whether Variable.clone() clones the computation graph or not. In this case, a dump of the graph would be useful.
body:
Is there any method to dump a Variable's underlying computation graph? This will be useful for debugging use.

For example, some people may be confused about whether Variable.clone() clones the computation graph or not. In this case, a dump of the graph would be useful.
